title: CNBC Daily Open: Asia markets and precious metals rebound amid Trump's trade deal with India
summary_full: As part of the deal, New Delhi will "BUY AMERICAN" at "a much higher level," and stop buying oil from Russia, according to Trump.
summary_public: As part of the deal, New Delhi will "BUY AMERICAN" at "a much higher level," and stop buying oil from Russia, according to Trump.
